name: Production Asking Rate
query:
select *, cast((`Scheduled Delivery Qty`-`Dispatched`)/`Remaining Days` as Int) as `Asking Rate (Dispatch)`,
   (cast((`Scheduled Delivery Qty`-`Dispatched`)/`Remaining Days` as Int)-`Painted`) as `Asking Rate (Painting)`,
   (cast((`Scheduled Delivery Qty`-`Dispatched`)/`Remaining Days` as Int)-`Cut`) as `Asking Rate (Cutting)`,
   (cast((`Scheduled Delivery Qty`-`Dispatched`)/`Remaining Days` as Int)-`Moulded`) as `Asking Rate (Moudling)`
 from (select p.part_code,p.part_name,
   (select qty from `tabDelivery Schedule` where %(dt)s >= from_date and 
        %(dt)s <= to_date and product_code=p.part_code) as `Scheduled Delivery Qty`,
   (select from_date from `tabDelivery Schedule` where %(dt)s >= from_date and 
        %(dt)s <= to_date and product_code=p.part_code) as `From Date`,
   (select to_date from `tabDelivery Schedule` where %(dt)s >= from_date and 
        %(dt)s <= to_date and product_code=p.part_code) as `To Date`,
   (select if(abs(datediff(%(dt)s,`To Date`))=0,1,abs(datediff(%(dt)s,`To Date`)))) as `Remaining Days`,
   count(case when (cast(ps.moulding_completed_on as date) <= %(dt)s and 
          (ps.cutting_completed_on is null or cast(ps.cutting_completed_on as date) > %(dt)s)) 
        then 1 else null end) as `Moulded`,
   count(case when (cast(ps.cutting_completed_on as date) <= %(dt)s and 
          (ps.painting_completed_on is null or cast(ps.painting_completed_on as date) > %(dt)s)) 
        then 1 else null end) as `Cut`,
   count(case when (cast(ps.painting_completed_on as date) <= %(dt)s and 
          (ps.dispatched_on is null or cast(ps.dispatched_on as date) > %(dt)s)) 
        then 1 else null end) as `Painted`,
   count(case when (cast(ps.dispatched_on as date) >= 
            (select from_date from `tabDelivery Schedule` where %(dt)s >= from_date and 
              %(dt)s <= to_date and product_code=p.part_code) 
          and
           cast(ps.dispatched_on as date) <= 
            (select to_date from `tabDelivery Schedule` where %(dt)s >= from_date and 
              %(dt)s <= to_date and product_code=p.part_code)) then 1 else null end) as `Dispatched`
     from `tabProduct Status` ps, `tabProduct` p, `tabSerial No` sn 
     where ps.serial_no=sn.serial_no and p.part_code=sn.product_code and p.part_code like %(pcode)s group by p.part_code) a
